resources.string: Check Your internet connection and refresh
Updating rates was unsucessful. Try again later.

The exchange rates presented here are informational only. Data is provided by FixerApi and is refreshed once every 1 hour. Rates can change at any time and we cannot guarantee their accuracy.

Before any exchange transaction we suggest checking official rates at the place of the transaction.
We accept no responsibility for any losses incurred as a result of information read in this app.
